title: Lemon quinoa and asparagus salad bowl
ingredients: ['450g fresh asparagus, trimmed', '2 teaspoons coconut oil', '1/2 onion, diced', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '185g cooked red quinoa', '120ml reduced salt vegetable stock', '1 tablespoon ground turmeric', '65g nutritional yeast', '1/2 large lemon, juiced']
